## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install cosmos_reasoning in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure cosmos_reasoning package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to cosmos_reasoning
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/HasanGoni/cosmos_reasoning):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/HasanGoni/cosmos_reasoning.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/HasanGoni/cosmos_reasoning)

``` sh
$ conda install -c HasanGoni cosmos_reasoning
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/cosmos_reasoning/)

``` sh
$ pip install cosmos_reasoning
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/HasanGoni/cosmos_reasoning)’s
[pages](https://HasanGoni.github.io/cosmos_reasoning/). Additionally you
can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/HasanGoni/cosmos_reasoning) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/cosmos_reasoning/) respectively.
